WRITING.TITLE: My manga collection so far ~ July 2019

WRITING.TEXT: Punpun was amazing and no other words to describe it. I picked it up a couple of weeks ago and ran through it in 2 days. Glad I spent the time and money on it. Was a depressing ride :)
Yeah I figure I have the first 3 might as well wait till the fourth.
Yeah that corner houses my manga and console boxes. Actually the very last shelf on my book case has a few boxes from my pc parts that I #8217;m not sure why I keep :)

Volumes 1-6 were actually the first manga I ever owned . But when I went to order more I did the math and it came out to more than the box set for less volumes so I went with the box sets from then on cuz the value was really good.

Yeah I #8217;ve seen ebay stuff on YouTube. I just took advantage on the Barnes and noble buy 2 for 1 on viz media manga on Friday. Got me Vol 1-16 of My Hero Academia and 9 of Tokyo ghoul re and a few other things. There was also a 20% off code so I ended up saving 95 bucks. Should be here by this Friday I can #8217;t wait :D
I #8217;ll look into it. I also plan to look on rightstuff cuz I hear the deals are amazing and they always do sales

I usually buy stuff on amazon cuz it gets here in one day and I just love to have it on my shelf as fast as I can. But being 19 and a college student. Rightstuff and any other website that sells manga new is gonna have to be my new choice :)
You bet :D
Nice. I just ordered volumes 1-16 of my hero academia I can #8217;t wait :D
No I followed Tokyo ghoul before part one was even finished so I actually picked them up one buy one as they came out
I #8217;m gonna take the guess and say yeah cuz they look similar and Ik for a fact it #8217;s an IKEA bookshelf
Yeah that #8217;s what I hear. Ima have to get another soon. I have 21 volumes coming this week and that #8217;s almost gonna fill up the rest of my shelf.

Volumes 1-16 of MHA 9 amp; 8 of Tokyo ghoul re 1-3 of deathnote (rebuy because of the severe water damage on these 3) Barnes and noble has a buy 2 get one so I splurged on MHA after I finished the anime and I couldn #8217;t wait for October :D
It was a nice buy. Was 5 dollars shy of $100 saved. Later this week I plan on buying the rest of MHA and possibly start something else. Not sure yet but something :)
Yeah I usually read what I got then move on but this sale is still going so I intend to save myself money for the long run.

My second volume came in not too long ago and man the first book was good. But the second is addicting I plan on finishing it tonight but Ik it #8217;s gonna be a hard wait till hardcover 3 in November
Nice punpun :D that was so good even though it was depressing
Depends what type of genres do you like?
Have you ever looked into monster? I hear it #8217;s really good and I #8217;m looking to try that out as well the story sounds great
I just ordered volumes1-16 of my hero and a few other things. That double stack saved me almost 100 bucks :D
Maybe cuz viz has all the popular manga and people see a deal and buy out the whole store :)
After I picked up those 16 volumes of My hero I #8217;ve been hearing a lot about promised neverland, looks like I #8217;m def double dipping :(

Yeah man I hear you I #8217;ve been getting hardcovers recently and even punpun was like 15. Though I will say it #8217;s all worth it cuz they look so nice on the shelf and what #8217;s inside them make it better.
I got punpun a couple of weeks ago and man.....was such a good manga....

I second this also because of what I read from the first two hardcovers of berserk the story is really addicting. And if you want another book with great artwork goodnight punpun has amazing artwork and a great story that is very depressing.
I liked the Tokyo ghoul anime but the manga is def better and worth checking out. More to the story and the second half is the actual original story and makes Tokyo ghoul re actually make sense.
I just ordered volumes 1-16 of Boku no hero cuz of the viz sale at Barnes and noble :D
Viz is doing a buy 2 get 1 at Barnes and noble. I got volumes 1-16 of my hero coming Thursday and a few other things. Saved 95 dollars with the 20% off code as well. Should look into it.
Such a good book. I hope you like it :)

WRITING.TITLE: B amp;N haul finally came in :D

WRITING.TEXT: I actually have the deathnote box set. Water leaked out of my vents and landed on a few books and the first 3 of death note were hit so I rebought them. And I bought all of my hero after watching season 3 of the anime I couldn #8217;t wait to find out what happened next. Volumes 17-19 come tomorrow:D
It #8217;s really good I can #8217;t wait to see what happens next :)
I can #8217;t wait to get the manga. I loved the anime and Ik the manga has a lot more to it :D
Nice. I just bought all of MHA cuz of this sale and I plan on double dipping :D
Yeah I think he mixed up the extra book that comes with the box set. The actual story is 12 volumes
That #8217;s better :D

WRITING.TITLE: Small way to end off July :)

WRITING.TEXT: I bought both of these and while the beginning was a tiny bit slow man when you get into that second hardcover the story picks up A LOT. The wait for hardcover 3 is already brutal :D

No tbh I #8217;m not much of a fan of reading stuff online as well as this is gonna be the best way to read berserk. These giant panels just makes everything pop way more. Ik the wait is gonna suck but 3 volumes technically every 4 months isn #8217;t too bad and the wait for it will 110% be worth it.
Yeah man the wait will be worth it these things are absolutely gorgeous.
I just read goodnight pun not that long ago and that was amazing and I heard solanin was another one of his good works so I decided to pick it up can #8217;t wait to read it :D
There will be plenty more in August :D
It is but on amazon you can pick these things up for 30 bucks. These hardcovers are amazing in the oversized format. And on top of that the story on the inside is even better.
It came in today and I #8217;ve read half of the first volume I love it
Woah that #8217;s actually pretty interesting if that #8217;s the case :D
If you think about it one a year and a half for 20+ volumes of content on these hardcovers is actually not that bad
Yeah, I #8217;m waiting for volume 3 but in the meantime I #8217;ll keep reading then adding stuff and catch up on Vinland saga since I only have half the volumes :3

Okay so I actually decided to search up a little bit of artwork on berserk after he mentioned some of the art. He wasn #8217;t joking....that is literally the most detailed and best art I #8217;ve seen in manga. That is absolutely insane how much detail and work he put into those drawings

After seeing that I think it #8217;s better. Berserk focuses on detail and designs of characters and they look very good. It has a dark and gritty look to it. I think if you see it you #8217;ll understand. It #8217;s pretty freakin insane.
I #8217;m not even sure I just saw a lot of the panels on google images
Volume 20 comes out August 6th though so not anymore :D
Nice oyasumi punpun is amazing :D
Dude I feel you man I took a break from manga due to building my pc but I #8217;m back on it and I #8217;ve spent a couple hundred but it #8217;s so worth it :D
Punpun is fucking great. the second half caught me off guard. It #8217;s one of those story #8217;s that I thought about after I finished it.
And the art is amazing :)
August* but nice I also just picked up solanin :D
Nice MHA is always nice to see :D
I mean it #8217;s worth returning for a new one :D
I can #8217;t wait till volume 20 comes out in the states the cover is so awesome :)

I #8217;m planning on buying the Naruto box sets too soon I have all the one piece box sets which I #8217;m currently reading so after that #8217;s prob gonna be my next pickup. 1-27 for 97 bucks is a steal :)

One piece was my least favorite of the big 3 at first but when you really read one piece and enjoy the adventure you can understand the critical praise and why it remains on top to this day. Now it #8217;s my favorite of the big three by a lot. It #8217;s amazing how oda ties everything together. He #8217;s a genius :)

Based off the manga attack on titan end up turning into some of the greatest shish I #8217;ve ever seen. It really did just get better to the point my mouth dropped. I #8217;ll be picking up all the manga just like you cuz attack on titan is amazing :)
I just finished volume 49 and am halfway through 50 which is the end of thriller bark and man....I can see why one piece is on top.

It depends personally its about which one looks better and how well the spines hold up in those big version. In your case I would prefer deathnote to be singles and berserk even though It #8217;s new to me, the hardcovers are a lot better quality than the singles and feels like the best way to read it which is why I went with the hardcovers. (Gonna be a hard wait for the 3rd hardcover though :/ ) tbh though you aren #8217;t gonna miss out on anything so it #8217;s a preference thing.
I wanna pick up promised neverland too it looks good as well as volume 20 of my hero :3
Idk wtf bookoff but damn $5 looks like a damn steal :D

I #8217;m reading one piece right now and I #8217;m on volume 60 it is truly amazing and I #8217;m glad I picked up the box sets. The adventure is insane :D

Yeah Tokyo ghouls manga is a lot different than the anime especially that second half. A whole different story and ending to the first part of Tokyo ghoul. Re will make a lot more sense if you read the actual manga of Tokyo ghoul

One of my friends said the same thing about the anime and he doesn #8217;t even watch much anime and he really liked it. Put that thought aside and just read it. People who overthink it miss out on very good things :)

Don #8217;t be turned off by the first book it #8217;s more of a introduction. The second hardcover the story kicks off IN A VERY GOOD WAY. The struggle to wait for hardcover 3 has been so real :(

Yeah if you #8217;re gonna do Naruto or one piece I think you should get box sets for both

Punpun is the best of his works and I think most would agree and I think him himself thinks so as well so don #8217;t think it #8217;s a bad starting point it #8217;s just a pretty heavy topic but a very good one
Why not get the hardcovers of berserk? Much better than the small volumes in quality and enjoyment

If you think the art is good now.......The art later is next level stuff didn #8217;t think I #8217;d be that impressed but man it looks insanely good....

Yeah I #8217;ve had the box sets forever about a year and read just through Alabasta cuz college made me not wanna do anything but this summer I got back into manga. How in the hell does the cover just shift. Only way I see that happening is if the glue completely came off and you just tried gluing it again lmao. But no seriously you can #8217;t fix that. I #8217;ve never heard of that so tbh it most likely came like that and you just didn #8217;t notice. I don #8217;t think book spines just start shifting like that. Kind of sounds bizarre.
And also my hero spines are typically known to be off center. Most of mines are slightly off. It #8217;s not so much where it bothers me but it #8217;s noticeable if you stare hard enough.

I tend to like smaller formats as well but being a new berserk fan reading them in these gigantic formats is a lot more appealing and I #8217;ve seen the art work later on and I can #8217;t wait to see that stuff in a bigger format because it looks stunning asf. On top of that berserks story is amazing from what I #8217;ve read so far. If price is an issue you can find them for like 30 bucks on amazon. Which is the price of two standard volumes of berserk. But the hardcovers look very nice and are well made. I recommend them 100% as a new berserk fan.
What #8217;s so bad about the page here?
Ahh no I have the American editions and they have all the characters on the page. That #8217;s pretty unfortunate this edition doesn #8217;t have it

WRITING.TEXT: Nice box set and the covers are pretty nice

If you loved what you read in the beginning then you #8217;ll like everything else after even more. I #8217;m on volume 72 right now and the adventure they go through is just amazing. A great manga worth picking up for sure.( Also very colorful books so they look awesome on the shelves.
It came really fast too only took a couple days
I actually haven #8217;t started reading it yet. I #8217;ve watched the show though and I really liked it and Ik the manga has more to the story so I #8217;m 100% sure I #8217;m going to like it.

Im currently watching season 3 of the anime and am pretty close to starting part 4. I hear when the new director shows up, people think the show dips in quality. I myself have enjoyed the series so far but I notice in plate 4 the series dips in review. I'm hoping the series ends on a good note with me, but i'm worried Ill fall into place with what a lot of people think. Makes me sad cuz this show so far has been very good imo.

That #8217;s what I #8217;m worried about though, they are gonna adapt the mangas ending and I #8217;m worried it #8217;s gonna be trash like everyone says. This seems like one of those promising stories that gets fucked up and it #8217;s not something I want :(

I can #8217;t wait till I see how difficult this is gonna be on Bringer of Chaos. I #8217;m currently on chapter 3 now just finishing off Zeke. Ik these guys are gonna be a pain in the ass......

I just finished vagabond and I still need to read the 11th volume of Vinland saga but from what I #8217;ve read I think Vinland saga is still the superior manga. Vagabond does feel like a serious manga though it can be very very slow during points. The art however is fantastic in vagabond but reading Vinland saga gave me a little bit little bit of everything. Great art, amazing story, violence, and a world I wanted to keep seeing. though it doesn #8217;t really matter which one you pick up they are both must haves in your collection in my opinion. Can #8217;t go wrong with either :)
Noragami is one of those manga I want so bad but I #8217;m waiting till I finish buying all of magi. It hurts cuz i wanna read it sooooo bad :(

I #8217;m gonna assume you #8217;re speaking of vagabond. The quality of the paper isn #8217;t the best but it #8217;s certainly doesn #8217;t feel bad. I haven #8217;t had any issues and I finished the whole series.
All manga collections are beautiful and this is no exception :)
It is very good though it is a mature read. You will expect to see people getting killed and some sex throughout the manga. It is very very good though and the artwork is phenomenal.

Oh I #8217;ve read it all. I #8217;m not the author of this post just wanted to give my take. This is apart of my must reads along with berserk and Vinland saga which are the other two I #8217;m currently reading along with one piece.

The hardcovers for berserk are a great place to start. I #8217;m new to the series and have read the first 3 hardcovers and it lives up to the hype for me. Very good read. Vinland saga is a tie with berserk for me though. Both fantastic manga would def check them out :)

Thank you. I #8217;m newer to the series and people who just shit on berserks post golden age because others have is honestly annoying. They act like it #8217;s not good when I highly doubt that #8217;s the case.
Yeah but that doesn #8217;t make the story trash like everyone says. Everyone likes jumping on a bandwagon even though they haven #8217;t read it for themselves.

WRITING.TITLE: Just started calculus 1 did I graph number 12 properly?

WRITING.TEXT: Also would the answer be all real numbers besides 2 since 2 has a jump discontinuity? This would have been my answer.

WRITING.TITLE: Been awhile since my last post but here #8217;s my end of September early October buys. Includes my friends gift of all 10 JoJo part 3 volumes
So I #8217;m doing implicit differentiation and for this problem, depending on what side I put the variables I get different answers. I #8217;m confused on what I #8217;m doing wrong here.

WRITING.TEXT: Also forgot to mention the second picture is the answer in the book. I can get that answer if I switch the side I put my variables. This seems like basic algebra but for some reason this out of everything is aggravating me.
